headline: Show HN: Fill your hiring pipelines with ready-to-interview candidates
description:
As a former recruiter, I saw firsthand the struggle of getting relevant candidates into the hiring process. Companies could spend 10-20 hours per week just to go through endless LinkedIn profiles without knowing if the candidate will respond.

Connect is a product built by recruiters for recruiters. It's a sourcing platform that takes in requirements through a structured kick-off, then shares candidates that were reached out to by our recruiters and are already interested in speaking to the company.

Would love for you to check out the product and give us feedback!
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 用准备好的面试候选人填补你的招聘管道
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 用準備好的面試候選人填補你的招聘管道
description_zh-Hans: 作为一名前招聘人员，我亲眼目睹了让相关候选人进入招聘流程的艰难过程。公司每周可能要花10-20个小时来浏览无尽的LinkedIn资料，却不知道候选人是否会回应。它是一个采购平台，通过一个结构化的启动程序接收需求，然后分享由我们的招聘人员联系的、已经有兴趣与公司交谈的候选人。
description_zh-Hant: 作為一名前招聘人員，我親眼目睹了讓相關候選人進入招聘流程的艱難過程。公司每週可能要花10-20個小時來瀏覽無盡的LinkedIn資料，卻不知道候選人是否會回應。它是一個採購平臺，通過一個結構化的啟動程序接收需求，然後分享由我們的招聘人員聯繫的、已經有興趣與公司交談的候選人。
